title: Jolly LLB 2 actor Sayani Gupta: I want to be part of every good project that is made | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Jolly LLB 2 actor Sayani Gupta: I want to be part of every good project that is made 
The actor, who started her acting career in Bollywood with Margarita With A Straw, went on to do films such as Fan, Parched and Jolly LLB 2, and is grateful for getting the kind of opportunities she has got. bollywood Updated: Feb 17, 2017 18:32 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Actor Sayani Gupta will soon be seen in an Indo-British film called Hungary. 
Actor Sayani Gupta has been part of commercial as well as parallel cinema, but she does not put “films in boxes” when she is about to sign a project. 
“If it’s a story that I want to be part of, I go ahead without thinking which bracket should that film be put in. I believe in only good cinema and I want to be part of every good project that is made and play every good role that is written,” says Gupta. Read more Courtroom melodrama: Jolly LLB 2 review by Sarit Ray 
The actor, who started her acting career in Bollywood with Margaritta With A Straw, went on to do films such as Fan, Parched and Jolly LLB 2, and she is grateful for getting the kind of opportunities, which she has. 
“I understand that I am very fortunate to be able to do this because millions of us come to this city with same dreams and pretty much same kind of talent. But there are very few who are able to the kind of work they want to do,” she says. 
Gupta will soon be seen in an Indo-British film and she is thrilled to be part of an industry where she can meet new people. “The best part of our profession is that you get to work with different people and that’s the fun of the job because you are collaborating with different sensibilities. To be able to do that, that’s very exciting and any part that challenges me,” she says. tags
